document_data.name: Arbalest's House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Arbalest's House''' was a [[monastery]] and the most significant [[temple]] to [[Milil]] ''circa'' [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: Arbalest's House was located on a hilltop in the town of [[Athkatla]], north of [[Goldspires]] and of the harbor.
document_data.Structure: The walls, floors and ceilings of the temple were mostly made of stone. {{Cite web|url= https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1518237623663448068 |title= Ed Greenwood on Twitter |accessdate=2022-04-24 |author= [[Ed Greenwood]] |authorlink= |coauthors= |date=2022-04-24 |year=2022 |month=04 |format= |work= |publisher= |pages= |language= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |quote= }} Its most notable architectural feature was the [[Bellows of Milil]], a gigantic [[pipe organ]] intertwined with the structure of building itself.
document_data.Defenses: The [[Bellows of Milil]] provided the temple with several protecting [[spell]]s, with both defensive and offensive capabilities. It also contained several caches in the form of false pipes, used to store most of the temple's treasure (perfectly formed [[gem]]stones).
document_data.History: The temple was developed by the [[Patriarch of Song]], the utmost authority of the church. Milil himself journeyed to Arbalest's House during the [[Time of Troubles]], and personally founded a singing circle there.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The temple was said to contain several teleportation portals, including a portal leading to [[New Olamn]] in [[Waterdeep]] and created by Milil himself.
document_data.Inhabitants: While the temple itself hosted mostly Sorlyn priests, the ''Bellows'' was roamed by various creature such as [[wind walker]]s and [[volt]]s.
